The input component will be some number of prior observations, such as three years, or 36 time
steps.
The output component will be the total sales in the next month because we are interested
in developing a model to make one-step forecasts. We can implement this using the shift()
function on the Pandas DataFrame. It allows us to shift a column down (forward in time) or
